com.grp.application.monitor

Class Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.grp.application.monitor.Monitor

  • public class Monitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Monitor is the class collect monitor data, maintain monitor state, and set UI elements based on monitor state.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    UNNC GRP G19
